string.value: I've reached a limit to my training as a bowman...Is there a level beyond this? I should ask #b#p2020010##k who helped me with the third job advancement.
#b#p2020010##k told me to see the bishop #b#p2081300##k in Minar Forest if I want to find the path of becoming a greater bowman.
#b#p2081300##k said he will guide me to the path that will lead me to the magician's extreme power.

Long time no see. You remind me of the time when you came to me for the third advancement. Did you find the truth in your mind? You must have some reason to come to see me. What can I do for you?\r\n#b#L0# I want the 4th job advancement.#l

I knew that you would return to see me someday. But I have no power to make your wish come true. Go to #bMinar Forest#k. If you find #b#p2081300##k, he may be able help you. Would you like to meet him?
I'll write a recommendation letter for you. Hope you get a new power.
Aren't you here for the 4th job advancement? If you don't want it, that's fine.
What are you doing here, young Bowman? \r\n#b#L0# I want the 4th job advancement. I have a recommendation letter from #p2020010#.#l
#b#p2020010##k?... The one in El Nath? Then I can trust you.
A young Bowman dreaming of being a Bowmaster or Marksman. I have to tell you a few stories first. Talk to me when you're ready.
Remember. The bishop of Minar Forest, #b#p2081200##k. Please see him.
You lost #b#t4031342##k? I will write again but be careful.
